song_name: My Heart Is Lost to You
lyrics:
5 contributorsmy heart is lost to you lyricsverse 1
maybe it was the moonlight
the scent of you on the breeze
maybe it was your shadow that fell over me
such a beautiful stranger
eyes darker than coal
your first look crossed the desert into my soul

chorus
mi corazón perdido en ti
my heart is lost to you
you have captured my love completely
my heart is lost to you
oh my heart is lost to you

verse 2
maybe it was the music
the way it moved with your hair
or the heat of the moment that hung in the air
but when i saw you there dancing
mesmerized by your gaze
there was some kind of magic led me away

chorus
mi corazón perdido en ti
my heart is lost to you
you have captured my love completely
my heart is lost to you
oh my heart is lost to you
see brooks  dunn liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likechorus
mi corazón perdido en ti
my heart is lost to you
you have captured my love completely
my heart is lost to you
my heart is lost to youembed
